text: Ieell awen, deg iv ueummu, a pqeoobem ar tlawin nnwen. Nitenti d lebsa nnwen, kunwi d lebsa nnsent. Ieoa Oebbi ar tellam tepkellixem iman nnwen. Issuref awen, Isemmee awen. Tura qeoobet $uosent, nadit ayen i wen Iura Oebbi. Eccet, esswet, ar pferzem lxiv amellal, si lxiv aberkan, di tafrara. Sinna, ueummet ar yiv. Ur pqeooibet $uosent, ma taazlem iman nnwen di lowamaa. D tigi ay d tilas n Oebbi. Ur pqeooibet $uosent! Akka i Ipbeggin Oebbi issekniyen iS i yimdanen, amar ad eezzben
